dict.acceptation: 特有的；独特的；表示特性的；显示…的特征的；
特性，特征，特色，[数]（对数的）首数；独特性；性质；

sent.orig: Hog market cycle has its market characteristic, biology characteristic and characteristic of relevant provision competition.
sent.trans: 生猪市场周期有其市场特点，生物特点和相关食品竞争特点。

sent.orig: A of game must have the characteristic the unique characteristic system is foundation of the game.
sent.trans: 一款游戏必须有特色，独一无二的特色系统乃游戏之根基。

sent.orig: Nonionic surfactant take on moist and emulsification characteristic. Its characteristic is related to structure.
sent.trans: 非离子表面活性剂具有润湿、乳化等特性，其特性与结构类型有关。

sent.orig: Part 5 analyses the 3 aesthetic characteristic of the imagery, there are and inherentand multivocal characteristic.
sent.trans: 第五部分分析了意象的三个美学特点，即意象的独创性、浑成性、多义性。

sent.orig: One, the characteristic that coal money defaults and the characteristic that endanger money of 1 default.
sent.trans: 煤款拖欠的特点与危害1煤款拖欠的特点。
